SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT910
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is:
a) sent by an account servicing institution to an account owner.
b) sent by an account servicing institution to a party authorised by the account owner to receive the information.
c) sent by a concentrating financial institution to an account owner or a party authorised by the account owner to receive the information.
It is used to notify the account owner of an entry which has been credited to its account. The entry will be further confirmed by statement.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency as specified in ISO 4217 (Error code(s): C03).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Either field 50a or field 52a must be present, but not both."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-A With option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier), one of the following line formats must be used (Error code(s): T54): Line format 1 :/34x (Account) Line format 2 :4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. One of the following line formats must be used: /34x (Account) or 4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)"

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-B
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-B In option F, when subfield 1 Party Identifier is used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T55): ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies(F50a.FormatOption == 'F', Verify50FPartyIdCode($value)) /* get the code from party identifier if format is 4!a/2!a/27x */
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. When 'Party Identifier' is used with the format (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier), one of following codes must be used: ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-C
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-C With option F, subfield 2 (Name & Address), the following line format must be used for all lines: 1!n/33x (Number)(Details). (Error code(s): T54).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name & Address), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-D
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-D In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-E
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-E With option F - subfield 2 (Name & Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec (Error code(s): T56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name & Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-F
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-F Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT (Error code(s): T50).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT."

fieldvalidation.name: F50a-G
fieldvalidation.comment: F50a-G Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: F52a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: F52a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: F-50a-H
fieldvalidation.comment: F-50a-H The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57)."
